verses.verse: <S%G5124>This<s%> is the <S%G5154>third<s%> time I am <S%G2064>coming<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G5209>you.<s%> <S%G1909>"At<s%> the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> of <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2532>or<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G3144>witnesses<s%> <S%G2476>shall<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G4487>word<s%> be <S%G2476>established.<s%>"

I have said <S%G4280>beforehand,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> I do say <S%G4302>beforehand,<s%> as <S%G5613>when<s%> I was <S%G3918>present<s%> the second <S%G1208>time,<s%> <S%G2532>so<s%> <S%G3568>now,<s%> being <S%G548>absent,<s%> I <S%G1125>write<s%> to those who have <S%G4258>sinned<s%> before <S%G2532>now,<s%> and to <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3062>rest,<s%> <S%G3754>that,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G1519>I<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3825>again,<s%> I <S%G5339>will<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5339>spare;<s%>

<S%G1893>seeing<s%> that you <S%G2212>seek<s%> a <S%G1382>proof<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> who <S%G2980>speaks<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1698>me;<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G770>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G770>weak,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> is <S%G1414>powerful<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5213>you.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G2532><s%> he was <S%G4717>crucified<s%> <S%G1537>through<s%> <S%G769>weakness,<s%> <S%G235>yet<s%> he <S%G2198>lives<s%> <S%G1537>through<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%> <S%G1063>For<s%> we <S%G2249>also<s%> are <S%G770>weak<s%> <S%G846>in<s%> <S%G235>him,<s%> <S%G2198>but<s%> we will <S%G4862>live<s%> <S%G846>with<s%> <S%G1537>him<s%> <S%G1411>through<s%> the <S%G2316>power<s%> of <S%G1519>God<s%> <S%G5209>toward<s%> <S%G1722>you.<s%>

<S%G3985>Test<s%> your own <S%G1438>selves,<s%> <S%G1487>whether<s%> you <S%G2075>are<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4102>faith.<s%> <S%G1381>Test<s%> your own <S%G1438>selves.<s%> Or <S%G3756>don't<s%> you <S%G1921>know<s%> as to your own <S%G1438>selves,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5213>you?<s%> â€” <S%G1509>unless<s%> indeed you <S%G2075%G99999>are<s%> <S%G96>disqualified.<s%>

<S%G1223>For<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> cause <S%G5124>I<s%> <S%G1125>write<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G2443>while<s%> <S%G548>absent,<s%> <S%G3361>that<s%> I may not <S%G5530>deal<s%> <S%G664>sharply<s%> when <S%G3918>present,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G1849>authority<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> for <S%G3619>building<s%> <S%G2532>up,<s%> and <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> tearing <S%G2506>down.<s%>

<S%G3063>Finally,<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G5463>rejoice.<s%> Be <S%G2675>perfected,<s%> be <S%G3870>comforted,<s%> <S%G5426>be<s%> of the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G5426>mind,<s%> live in <S%G1514>peace,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%> will <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5216>you.<s%>

The <S%G5485>grace<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G26>love<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2842>fellowship<s%> of the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> be <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G3956>all.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>
